entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming east 20 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
